alert.note: Alert for Panola; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 8:23PM CST until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River At Logansport affecting Shelby, Panola and De Soto Counties. For the Sabine River...including Mineola, Hawkins, Gladewater, Longview, Beckville, Logansport...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River at Logansport. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Flooding will continue to slowly decrease and end during the next several days. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 23.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 30.2 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.2 feet on 04/05/1997. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Friday evening at 830 PM CST.
